p: A dual α-amylase- and α-glucosidase-inhibitory effect was observed for both Arum species as compared to acarbose. Apigenin, luteolin, and vitexin were identified in both species. All were strongly associated with the starch-digestive enzymes inhibitory effect [ 355]. The aqueous extract of A. dioscoridis significantly decreased the acute postprandial hyperglycemia induced in overnight fasting rats [ 355].
